content.prompt: Why do psychologists find it challenging to conduct experiments on individuals diagnosed with personality disorders?

choices.label: People with personality disorders would resist being randomly assigned to an experimental condition.
Experimental psychologists are not inclined to work with people who are socially challenging.
People with psychological disorders cannot be randomly assigned to groups.
People with personality disorders have a difficult time following instructions.

topic.text: 5.4: Selection of Categories of Psychological Disorders

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
